name: ArmenianToken
description: ArmenianToken (ARMT) is an ERC-20 token on Ethereum designed support verified charitable causes. It features a buy tax (0.5%) on DEX purchases that accumulates tokens in the contract for swapping to ETH and donating to charity. The project focuses on transparent, blockchain-powered giving to aid children and families in Artsakh and Armenia, with mechanisms for automatic or manual swaps, DEX whitelist management, and no minting or burning after deployment.
